custom_fields.key_topics:
¿	Objective and Subjective Drawing
¿	Positive and Negative Space
¿	Perspective
¿	Color Theory
¿	Surrealism
custom_fields.assessment_structure: This is a project-based class. All the project will be assessed according to a rubric.
custom_fields.goals: The goal for this course is to introduce fundamental drawing to the students.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Review artwork examples from the internet and in-class demonstrations.

long_desc: This is an introductory drawing course which intend to help develop basic observational drawing skills. Students will investigate different elements of drawing, focusing on methods and techniques to represent the illusion of the threedimensional world on a twodimensional surface.
name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo) Drawing & Surrealism
